data.TemplateBody:
AWSTemplateFormatVersion: 2010-09-09
Description: AppSync Template for a Realtime App

Parameters:
  graphQLAPIName:
    Type: String
    Description: The name for the AppSync GraphQL API to be created.
    Default: My Realtime App
    MinLength: 1
    MaxLength: 32

Outputs:
  GraphQLApiId:
    Description: Unique AWS AppSync GraphQL API Identifier
    Value: !GetAtt AppSyncSampleAPI.ApiId

Resources:

  AppSyncSampleAPI:
    Type: "AWS::AppSync::GraphQLApi"
    Properties:
      Name: !Sub ${graphQLAPIName}
      AuthenticationType: "API_KEY"

  AppSyncSampleSchema:
    Type: "AWS::AppSync::GraphQLSchema"
    DependsOn:
      - AppSyncSampleAPI
    Properties:
      ApiId: !GetAtt AppSyncSampleAPI.ApiId
      Definition: |
        type Channel {
          name: String!
          data: AWSJSON!
        }

        type Mutation {
            publish(name: String!, data: AWSJSON!): Channel
        }

        type Query {
            getChannel: Channel
        }

        type Subscription {
            subscribe(name: String!): Channel
                @aws_subscribe(mutations: ["publish"])
        }

  AppSyncNoneDataSource:
    Type: "AWS::AppSync::DataSource"
    DependsOn:
      - AppSyncSampleAPI
    Properties:
      ApiId: !GetAtt AppSyncSampleAPI.ApiId
      Name: "NoneDatasource"
      Description: "A None Datasource."
      Type: "NONE"

  AppSyncApiKey:
    Type: "AWS::AppSync::ApiKey"
    DependsOn:
     - AppSyncSampleAPI
    Properties:
      ApiId: !GetAtt AppSyncSampleAPI.ApiId
      Description: "Api Key for Realtime app"

  AppSyncResolver:
    Type: "AWS::AppSync::Resolver"
    DependsOn:
      - AppSyncSampleSchema
      - AppSyncNoneDataSource
    Properties:
      ApiId: !GetAtt AppSyncSampleAPI.ApiId
      TypeName: "Mutation"
      FieldName: "publish"
      DataSourceName: !GetAtt AppSyncNoneDataSource.Name
      RequestMappingTemplate: |
        {
          "version": "2017-02-28",
          "payload": {
              "name": "$context.arguments.name",
              "data": $util.toJson($context.arguments.data)
          }
        }
      ResponseMappingTemplate: |
        $util.toJson($context.result)
